titleStmt.title: Stand up to your beliefe, or, A combat betweene Satan tempting, and A Christian triumphing in the comfort of the Creed. By Tho. Iohnson. a. preach. of WolBorrow in Devon. 1640
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Thomas, minister of Woolborough.

publicationStmt.publisher: By E. G[riffin] and are to be sol by Thomas Hunt booke-seller in St. Peters Church-yard in Exeter,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Why dost with hope, vile wretch they soule deceive?".
